column4: Hey everyone. I've just upgraded to 11.04, and when I boot, my screen just stays black. I'm now under an earlier kernel which seems to work, but I got an error saying I didn't have the hardware to run Unity, and I should select something else. Any ideas ?
do you have the hardware to run it?
I assume so. i5, GTX 560, 8 GB RAM. It's a new box.
hmm you should post in  #ayanta as well
